column1: ## This ebus config may work for Ubbink
column4: Viessmann and some other systems that are just re-branded Brink devices

column1: ## - Brink Service Tool (decompiled via Jetbrains DotPeak): https://www.brinkclimatesystems.nl/tools/software-brink-service-tool-en
## This file is for Elan4 SW version from 1.01.04 to 9.99.99 ##
# Fill in the slave address of your device (hexa without '0x' prefix) instead of [fill_your_slave_address_here]
# Then just rename this file to [fill_your_slave_address_here].csv and you should be good to use it in ebusd.
## COMMON HRU COMMANDS ## (WTWCommands.cs - Some of them might not be applicable for this device

column14: NoResetRequested is a dummy message doing nothing. It might be useful for integration in MQTT and HA automation.
